b4.text: Begin deploying treasury to further build out the team - emphasis on launching our first protocol ASAP

b1.text: DAO proposals begin - Tokenomics, Treasury Management, etc.

b2.text: Begin developing, incubating, and funding new protocols using 10% of the treasury

b1.text: DAO proposals begin - Tokenomics, Treasury Management, etc.

b2.text: Begin developing, incubating, and funding new protocols using 10% of the treasury

sb1.text: First protocol we are focused on developing - native DAO tooling platform, expected launch in Q2-Q3 2022

sb2.text: Other protocols will come next - direction of what to build will be governed by the DAO

sb3.text: Magnet DAO will also incubate projects, helping early-stage blockchain projects with building their protocols and providing funding from the treasury in return for tokens, which Magnet DAO treasury will receive and hold

sb4.text: Magnet DAO will also participate in early-stage funding rounds for projects if we see fit and if the DAO decides to do so - these tokens will be owned and held in the Magnet DAO treasury

b1.text: Integrate native DAO tooling to make management seamless and integrated.

b2.text: Promote key contributors to leadership positions in the DAO

b3.text: License our DAO tooling to other DAO’s looking for a management system

b4.text: Continue to develop, incubate, and fund new protocols

sb1.text: At this stage, we will have initial products and will be building out networks and communities

sb2.text: We’d like DAO members to help contribute as much as possible with these new protocols, ideally with people taking on positions in the sub-communities
